snippet: A New York Times reporter was stopped at a checkpoint and then driven off for an unusual inquiry into her credentials.
abstract: Reporter Sabrina Tavernise recounts her encounter in eastern Ukraine with rebel who declared he was Russian mercenary, and took her to tea at his girlfriend's apartment to check her credentials.
lead_paragraph: A New York Times reporter was stopped at a checkpoint and then driven off for an unusual inquiry into her credentials.

headline.main: Whisked Away for Tea With a Rebel in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Whisked Away for Tea With a Rebel in Ukraine
